nodes.text: An armada of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Navy was active during the Galactic Civil War, and participated in a battle on the borders of the Hosnian system against a contingent of Rebel Alliance starships, including the MC75 Star Cruisers Accordance and Temperance, when the armada attempted to to launch a surprise assault on the Core Worlds at the same time as the Battle of Endor. The Imperial armada was defeated, though it managed to destroy the Accordance.
